FieldSet.description: LANEndpoint: CMDB Class that stores information about communication endpoints that, when their related interface device is connected to a LAN, can send and receive dataframes. LAN endpoints include MAC addresses, and Ethernet, token ring, and FDDI interfaces. The BMC_InSegment class is used to relate instances of the BMC_ConnectivitySegment class to instances of BMC_LANEndpoint. To represent individual Large Area Networks (LNs), use the BMC_LANEndpoint class. To relate individual LNs to an instance of BMC_LNsCollection, use the BMC_LNsInCollection class. This class corresponds to the DMTF class CIM_LANEndpoint.
FieldSet.label: LAN Endpoint
